mapper.sql: id, file_name, excel_href, upload_time, uploder, status, operate, operate_time, del_flag
mapper.select:
SELECT FROM add_income_excel
ORDER BY upload_time DESC LIMIT #{startIndex} , #{pageSize}
mapper.insert:
insert into add_income_excel
id,
file_name,
excel_href,
upload_time,
uploder,
status,

mapper.update:
update add_income_excel
file_name = #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
excel_href = #{excelHref,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
upload_time = #{uploadTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
uploder = #{uploder,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
operate = #{operate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operate_time = #{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update add_income_excel set file_name = #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, excel_href = #{excelHref,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, upload_time = #{uploadTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, uploder = #{uploder,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, operate = #{operate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operate_time = #{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
UPDATE add_income_excel SET del_flag=1,operate=#{operator},operate_time=now() where id=#{id} and status=0
